title: thulasi jagatjanani
sahitya:
tulasI jagajjanani duritApa hAriNi

anupallavi

 bila varamagu nI sari vElpulu lEraTa brOvu mIkanu

caraNam

 caraNa yugambulu nadulaku parama vaikuNThamaTa sarasijAkSi nI madhyamu sakala surA vAsamaTa 
shiramuna naigama kOTulu celugucu nunnAraTa sarasa tyAgarAjAdi vara bhaktulu pADEraTa
